name: sweet summer tee
notes:
description: this summer tee is perfect for beginners! the simple stitches and easy shaping make for a fun and quick project. the slightly oversized fit makes it extra comfy and wearable.

>>>this pattern is [free on my blog!][1]

>>>this pattern is [available as a kit through lion brand.][2] the kit comes with the digital pdf pattern + all the yarn needed to make your top!


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/sweet-summer-tee-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: https://shrsl.com/2bvkc
